item.title: HugoBook+GithubAction
item.description: In Windows10, build personal website via Hugo-book and Github Actions # This is blog is about how to use Hugo to create the local website, and then deploy it on GitHub via Github Action. Everything is step by step. Prerequisites # Git Windows 10 VScode Github account Install Hugo # In Windows10, right click Windows Powershell and click run as administrator. Refer to How to install chocolatey in Windows to install chocolatey.

item.title: Hugo
item.description: How to use Hugo-book theme # How to insert images and resize images? # The file tree is like ├─content │ │ _index.md │ │ │ └─docs │ ├─blogs │ │ │ hugo.md │ │ │ _index.md │ │ │ │ │ └─images │ │ Nice.png In hugo.md file, we add Nice.png and scale it by References # hugo book demo hugo博客 文内插入图片
